upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10,
* Fixed a bug: Temperature reporting frequency is now reporting correctly in minutes intervals set in parameter 45. 
* Hardware 4 
* 700 Z-Wave Chip.
* The metal casted transmission fork was changed to the new high-quality plastic (UV proof acetal homopolymer) transmission fork. This new-generation plastic transmission fork can fit lower-profile valves and will not damage the metal valve lever over time. 
*Long Range ready
